dependsOn.activity: Lookup max date on base table

activities.name: Lookup max date on base table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select max(DATE) 
as Base_max_date from dbo.bank_transactions_base

scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[bank_control_table] (
    [DestinationTable] VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL,
    [SourceTable]      VARCHAR (50) NULL,
    [MaxDate]          DATETIME     NULL,
    [LastLoadDate]     DATETIME     NULL,
    [RowsCopied] VARCHAR (50) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_bank_control_table] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([DestinationTable] ASC)
);
